props.initial: Initial direction of chevron/triangle. Valid values are: 'down', 'left' ,'right' and 'up'
props.rotate90: If `true` rotates chevron 90 degrees. Default is 180 degrees
props.triangle: Use filled triangle instead of chevron
props.clockwise: Rotate chevron/triangle clockwise. Default is counter clockwise
props.switch: Flick this to rotate chevron/triangle to initial/rotated position
props.icon: Name of the icon to use instead of default chevron/triangle
